title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, there is no children node listing.
EB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children node listing should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement.
2. In the data set editor, go to the data source page.
3. Change the data source to a new one that has no database/table/column information.
4. Observe that there is no children node listing.
5. Close the data set editor and reopen it to verify the issue.
